meanings.definition: Not going astray; accurately directed or precise.
meanings.sent1: The unerring flight of the arrow hit the bullseye every time.
meanings.sent2: The unerring GPS system led them straight to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The unerring path of the squirrel as it leaped from tree to tree was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her unerring sense of style always made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The unerring rhythm of the drummer kept the band in perfect harmony.
